message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Take it or leave it.
Alice, your sense of fair is a bit off.  I'm offering a 55/45 split in my favor. It's a good deal considering the inflation. Don't wait too long.
Bob, let's be realistic.  The inflation is eating our potential gains. I propose a 50/50 split to end this now before we both lose out.
